title: EARTHGANG in the Trap! with Karlous Miller and Clayton English!
itunes:title: EARTHGANG in the Trap! with Karlous Miller and Clayton English!
description:
The coldest podcast is back with the HEAT! Earthgang is in the trap with Karlous Miller and Clayton English spitting bars and dropping gems! You might know EarthGang from Spillage Village or their Dreamville family or from Atlanta! They hopped on the show bustin dope freestyles with Karlous and Clayton off the rip. Plus they take it back to what it was like before they made it and they were delivering pizzas.


EArthgang tells the story of getting on tour with TDE and breakdown how that experience hustling set them up for success. EArthgang repping Atlanta tough and get to talking bout the water boys, falcons and everything ATlanta! This is the coldest podcast! #earthgang #85southshow #karlousmiller



Hit Our Website for more info: https://www.85southshow.com/

Get our custom merchandise: https://85apparelco.com/

Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

WATCH KARLOUS' MILLER's COMEDY SPECIAL! https://vimeo.com/ondemand/karlousmil...



FOLLOW THE CREW


KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/

DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/

CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/


Director - JOE T. NEWMAN - www.ayoungplayer.com

Producer CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/

It's Jon - https://www.instagram.com/holaj_o_n/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
